home.tagline: Cricket tragic, long-suffering Arsenal supporter, nerd, engineering leader.
home.worriesDescription: Liege of the one, the only Lord Bendtner
home.shortVersionBody: Hi, I'm Siddhu. As you can probably tell from my having bothered to create a personal website, I'm a bit of a nerd. I live in London, play cricket very badly, and waste far too much of my life worrying about Arsenal.
home.leagueWinSuffix: seconds since we won the league at White Hart Lane.
home.whatIDoBodyIntro: I am a Principal Engineer/Director at
home.whatIDoBodyMiddle: , where I lead multiple engineering teams across the UK and EU for Cisco Security Cloud Control's Firewall Manager (formerly known as CDO), delivering a coherent, automatable experience for
home.whatIDoBodyOutro: firewalling-as-a-service to their customers, and am responsible for the API-first automation and programmability toolchains that support it.

cv.heading: CV
cv.body: A concise CV section can go here. You can later replace this with a link to a downloadable PDF and a brief summary of your experience.
